provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animals (Control of
Experiments) Regulations, 1951.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. Every licensee under the Act shall render to the Minkter on or
within thirty days after the 30th day of June and the 31st day of
December in each year a return in the form set out as Form 2 in Form2.
the Schedule of all experiments performed by him during the half-
year ending on such 30th day of June or 31st day of December, as
the case may be.
